meanings.definition: Of or relating to a rector.
meanings.sent1: The rectorial duties involve overseeing the church's administration.
meanings.sent2: The rectorial appointment was a great honor for the community.
meanings.sent3: The rectorial robe was accidentally worn backward during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was rectorial, guiding the team with wisdom and grace.
meanings.sent5: The rectorial presence of the rector commanded respect from all parishioners.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a rector or rectory.
meanings.sent1: The rectorial residence provided housing for the rector and his family.
meanings.sent2: The rectorial garden was well-tended and full of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The rectorial cat enjoyed exploring the peaceful rectory grounds.
meanings.sent4: The rectorial atmosphere of the rectory was welcoming and serene.
meanings.sent5: The rectorial duties included maintaining the historic rectory building.
